name: üìù Figma working process
description:
This process purpose is to keep Figma's teams, projects, and files organised so everyone can distinguish in progress work from production, ready to dev or archive files with specific guidelines to avoid missing work when restoring versions.


More about how we came up with the process and other approaches: https://labcodes.com.br/blog/articles/organising-process-for-figma-files-and-teams.html
